project_plan.name: Weather Information Fetcher in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that retrieves and displays the current weather information, including temperature, humidity, and weather conditions for a specified city using a public API.

task.name: Set up the project environment and install necessary libraries (e.g., requests).
Implement a function to fetch weather data from the public API based on the input city.
Process the API response to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions.
Implement a function to display the fetched weather data in the terminal.
Write tests for each of the functions implemented above.
Execute tests on the implemented features to ensure they function correctly.
